item.title: Plotting Strava Data
item.description: What is this? As an avid sportman, lover of data metrics and a user of R, I decided that the best way to relax over the holidays was to try graphing my running and riding stats from the last year. I’ll let you decide if it’s a worthwhile holiday activity or not. After a bit of work getting the data and then mucking around with the graphs I thought to make the work available for any other hobbyist in this particular niche.
